about_the_game:
See how an unvoluntary part-time detective assistant of unknown origin modifies minds on a daily basis, humors his boss, keeps his roommate like a cat and hunts down his official love interest half-heartedly in this BL visual novel.

The year is 2079. More than two decades have passed since the AI bubble burst, leaving behind a world where strong AI research is strictly outlawed. But during a live reality show, A bold claim is made—someone among them isn't human, but AI! Some scoff, some seize the moment for attention, and Lucas, a part-time delivery worker, is just an unlucky bystander caught in the chaos—or is he?

Secretly possessing a mind-altering ability hasn’t made Lucas’s life any easier. Two years into adulthood, he remains trapped in the same struggle: jumping between jobs, barely making ends meet, and unable to to move on from the ghosts of his past. Worse still, he may have just landed himself in serious trouble. Maybe it’s time to start pruning his life.

  • Main character. A smooth liar, a mind reader, and a psychic.

  • A roommate and childhood friend, being a dropout but dreaming to design the first AGI in the world.

  • A nosy detective from an AI regulatory authority who knows a little too much.

  • A famous tech upstart, founder of a robotics company.

  • 3 romanceable characters, 3 branching storylines, leading to 13 impossible endings with 3 happy endings and 1 true ending.

  • Not entering a route, but exiting one. You must help the protagonist let go of unnecessary characters to step into a personal route.

  • Around 12 hours of gameplay to full achievement.

  • Much drama, little romance.

  • Toggleable built-in guides and story flowchart

"The Mind Deceivers" Trilogy is a series of pyschology science fantasy BL cinematic novels. Titles in this trilogy shares the same world view but can be played independently. Each title has its own characters and story, with only 1-2 recurring characters as cameos.

This is the grand finale of "The Mind Deceivers" Trilogy.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes mild language, depiction of criminal activity and threat of violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Artificial Instincts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You came here with a motive, so as everyone, except that you are able to change theirs. Ride with Lucas to turn down all the love interests or end their trouble in this (obviously artificial intelligence-themed) sci-fi BL visual novel. Enjoy the long-waited grand finale in this trilogy!
